column5: Well one of my lifelong girlfriends uncle passed away years ago, and it was his bday a few days back, and she shared this LOTWs musky pic with me.  I thought id share it here just outta respect, and i just love seeing old fishing pics.  Check out this monster?
That is neat, I enjoy anything older with regards to fishing.

That's a beauty fish and that's also the way it was done years ago for the obligatory picture....We have come a long way since then but the memories and stories remain .  I hope your girl friend keeps those memories close. Thanks for sharing.
